content.text:
[@lancew](@W87GwaaxNj0PSBbtc5qUm/A/xOO8AWPdNtJn6hzR8s0=.ed25519)

Happy I could help! I'm super impressed by /dark-crystal, I'd seen development screenshots but it's really fun to play with.

By the way, if your Patchwork is open there are AUR packages for [`ssb-patchwork`](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/ssb-patchwork/) and [`ssb-patchwork-git`](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/ssb-patchwork-git/) if you're feeling courageous. :wrench:
